p: In this study, we provide molecular insights into how HIF-1α regulates the replication of IAV by interfering with AMPKα signalling-mediated autophagy in AEC2. We first demonstrated that epithelial cell-specific Hif1α knockout mice infected with IAV had more IAV replication in the lung and developed severe lung inflammation. Knockdown of HIF-1α in A549 promoted IAV replication in vitro by reducing glycolysis and augmenting AMPKα-ULK1-mediated autophagy. The findings have provided us novel therapeutic targets for dealing with IAV infection.
